title: Stocks Coverage on the Technology Sector -- CenturyLink, Windstream Holdings, Telefonica, EarthLink Holdings, and Orange
text: Stocks Coverage on the Technology Sector -- CenturyLink, Windstream Holdings, Telefonica, EarthLink Holdings, and Orange   Published on 2015-09-11 07:02:51 Stocks Coverage on the Technology Sector -- CenturyLink, Windstream Holdings, Telefonica, EarthLink... -- NEW YORK, September   <-   NEW YORK , September   Equity Research Institute has initiated coverage on the following equities: CenturyLink Inc. (NYSE: CTL ), Windstream Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: WIN ), Telefonica S.A. (NYSE: TEF ), EarthLink Holdings Corporation (NASDAQ: ELNK ), and Orange (NYSE: ORAN ). Free research report on CenturyLink can be accessed at https://www.erionline.net/reports?keyword=CTL On Thursday, September 10, 2015 , the NASDAQ Composite ended at 4,796.25, up 0.84%, the Dow Jones Industrial Average edged 0.47% higher, to finish the day at 16,330.40, and the S&P 500 closed at 1,952.29, up 0.53%. The gains were broad based as eight out of nine sectors ended the session in positive. Register for your complimentary reports at the links given below. On Thursday, shares in CenturyLink Inc. recorded a trading volume of 7.83 million shares, higher than their three months average volume of 5.97 million shares. The stock ended the day 0.70% lower at $26.78 . Shares of the company traded at a PE ratio of 21.25. CenturyLink Inc.'s stock has lost 3.23% in the last one month, 16.51% in the previous three months and 28.83% on YTD basis. The company is trading below its 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 3.68% and 19.30%, respectively. Furthermore, shares of CenturyLink Inc. have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 48.08. Sign up and read the free notes on CTL at: https://www.erionline.net/reports?keyword=CTL Windstream Holdings Inc.'s stock advanced 1.19%, to close Thursday's session at $7.64 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 3.22 million shares, below its three months average volume of 4.50 million shares. Over the last one month and over the previous three months, Windstream Holdings Inc.'s shares have surged 26.49% and 2.26%, respectively. However, the stock has declined 37.55% since the start of this year. The company is trading 26.76% above its 50-day moving average. Furthermore, Windstream Holdings Inc.'s stock has an RSI of 66.58. The complimentary notes on WIN can be downloaded in PDF format at: https://www.erionline.net/reports?keyword=WIN Telefonica S.A.'s stock finished Thursday's session 1.19% lower at $13.30 . A total of 0.96 million shares were traded, which was below its three months average volume of 1.56 million shares. Over the last one month and the previous three months, Telefonica S.A.'s shares have lost 13.64% and 8.47%, respectively. Furthermore, the stock has lost 2.51% since the beginning of 2015. The company's shares are trading below their 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 8.69% and 7.46%, respectively. Telefonica S.A.'s stock traded at a PE ratio of 21.11 and has an RSI of 32.15. Register for free on Equity Research Institute and access the latest research on TEF at: https://www.erionline.net/reports?keyword=TEF On Thursday, shares in EarthLink Holdings Corp. ended the session 2.20% higher at $8.84 . The stock reported a trading volume of 0.72 million shares, below its three months average volume of 1.16 million shares. EarthLink Holdings Corp.'s shares have gained 0.68% in the last one month and 22.94% in the previous three months. Furthermore, the stock has rallied 105.01% since the start of this year. The company is trading 8.88% above its 50-day moving average and 52.58% above its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of EarthLink Holdings Corp. have an RSI of 58.96. The complete research on ELNK is available for free at: https://www.erionline.net/reports?keyword=ELNK Orange 's stock advanced 1.64%, to close the day at $16.08 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 0.45 million shares, below its three months average volume of 0.57 million shares. Over the last one month and since the start of this year, Orange's shares have declined 3.31% and 2.22%, respectively. However, the stock has gained 1.77% in the previous three months. The company's shares are trading 0.41% above their 50-day moving average. Additionally, Orange traded at a PE ratio of 41.23 and has an RSI of 54.19. Free in-depth research on ORAN is available at: -- About Equity Research Institute: Equity Research Institute ("ERI") produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. ERI has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps.
